=======
visible
=======

.. js:attribute:: visible

**domain**: client 

**language**: javascript

**class** :doc:`Filter class </refs/client/filter_api>`


Description
===========


If the value of this property is **true** the input control for this filter will
be created by the
:doc:`create_filter_inputs </refs/client/item/m_create_filter_inputs>`
method, if the **filters** option in not specidied.

See also
========

:doc:`Filters </programming/data/filters>`

:doc:`value <at_value>`

:doc:`Dataset </programming/data/dataset>`
